name: THE LAB OF THE MONSTERS (TM) 3D
description:
The point and click FPS turned into a fully 3D FPS

INCLUDES:

-More enemies!

-More guns!!!

-More Levels!

-More FUN

-And Available for mobile!

CONTROLS:

W,S=move

A,D=turn

UP,DOWN=MOVE

LEFT,RIGHT=turn

Space=FIRE

RSHIFT=enable third person

LSHIFT=disable third person

WARNING: (Medium/Hard Difficult)

MAFP:15+

Created with: SUP3DEngine [DOWNLOAD]

NOTE: if you dont see the icon on the desktop go to C:\Users\≺YOURUSER≻\AppData\Local\Programs
